DisableLoopbackLargeMTU_IPv6.Command: netsh int ipv6 set global loopbacklargemtu=disable

DisableLoopbackLargeMTU_IPv4.Command: netsh int ipv4 set global loopbacklargemtu=disable

SetTCP_BBR2_Internet.Command: netsh int tcp set supplemental Template=Internet CongestionProvider=bbr2

SetTCP_BBR2_Datacenter.Command: netsh int tcp set supplemental Template=Datacenter CongestionProvider=bbr2

SetTCP_BBR2_Compat.Command: netsh int tcp set supplemental Template=Compat CongestionProvider=bbr2

SetTCP_BBR2_DatacenterCustom.Command: netsh int tcp set supplemental Template=DatacenterCustom CongestionProvider=bbr2

SetTCP_BBR2_InternetCustom.Command: netsh int tcp set supplemental Template=InternetCustom CongestionProvider=bbr2

EnableLoopbackLargeMTU_IPv6.Command: netsh int ipv6 set global loopbacklargemtu=enable

EnableLoopbackLargeMTU_IPv4.Command: netsh int ipv4 set global loopbacklargemtu=enable

RevertTCP_CUBIC_Internet.Command: netsh int tcp set supplemental Template=Internet CongestionProvider=CUBIC

RevertTCP_CUBIC_InternetCustom.Command: netsh int tcp set supplemental Template=InternetCustom CongestionProvider=CUBIC

RevertTCP_CUBIC_Compat.Command: netsh int tcp set supplemental Template=Compat CongestionProvider=CUBIC

RevertTCP_CUBIC_Datacenter.Command: netsh int tcp set supplemental Template=Datacenter CongestionProvider=CUBIC

RevertTCP_CUBIC_DatacenterCustom.Command: netsh int tcp set supplemental Template=DatacenterCustom CongestionProvider=CUBIC
